author: cms-sw
body: This PR enables the `--maxmem_profile` flag (if available) for production arch relval tests. Flag will be added only to default workflows (plus any extra workflows enabled via `please test workflow wf-num`) for production arch. Any special flavors (e.g. nano, high-stats, gpu or non-product IBs/archs) will not enable this.
title: added --maxmem_profile for default production arch relvals
